titles.title: Making emergency supplemental appropriations for wildland fire management for fiscal year 2000.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Appropriations.

bill.summary: 5/15/2000--Introduced. Makes emergency supplemental appropriations for FY 2000 for: (1) the Department of the Interior for the Bureau of Land Management, wildland fire management, for emergency rehabilitation and wildfire suppression activities; and (2) the Department of Agriculture for the Forest Service, wildland fire management, for emergency rehabilitation, presuppression, and wildfire suppression.
